message: We're back in the room at the center of his mind.
The black tattoos have covered his chest.
I take a deep breath and look into his sad eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You know, don't you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You said it yourself. No matter how hard you try to forget, you can't change the past."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You hurt a lot of people, including your mother... You can't erase that fact."

name: 紅雀
message: "Stop it!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. You have to hear this. Whether you wanted it to happen or not, that blood is on your hands."

name: 紅雀
message: "...I know. I've got so much blood on my hands. I don't deserve to live. I know that!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, maybe dying is one way to atone."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But if you die, that's it. That's the end. The end of your torment and the end of you. You'll be free from your pain."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...But is that really okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is it okay for you to run away like that?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You... can't stop me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're right. And maybe that's okay for you, but what about all the people you'll be leaving behind? Like the members of your gang... and me."

name: 紅雀
message: "Beni-Shigure... they'll be fine. When I'm gone, they'll just find a new leader."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then what about me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What'll happen to me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't you dare say I'll be fine without you. I told you before not to put words in my mouth."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Because I'm not going to be okay, and neither is your gang. Your friends aren't as strong as you think they are."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you die, we're the ones it's gonna hurt. We'll have to carry that pain for the rest of our lives. And you have the nerve to say we'll be okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "The heart's not like the body. Its wounds never truly heal. Not completely."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, you know that better than anyone, don't you? You came back to the island to heal, but you lost yourself the second Ryuuhou showed up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And now you want us to suffer the same?"

name: 紅雀
message: "...Then what do I do?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's only one other option."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure, the tattoo made you lose your mind, but those actions were yours. That fact doesn't change."

name: 蒼葉
message: "As long as you're you, you'll never be free of that. But despite that..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We... I know you."
Koujaku grits his teeth and hangs his head. The tattoos have ceased their advance.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Whatever you've done, whatever your burden, you're still the same Koujaku."

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you ever lose sight of yourself again, I'll tell you about the Koujaku I know. No matter how many times it takes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll tell you how I always believed in him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So don't give up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't let that tattoo win."
Slowly, the despair on his face fades and the light returns to his eyes.
The black tattoos crumble and vanish.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm gonna destroy you, Koujaku. I'm gonna destroy the part of you that's trapped in the past."
